details.title: 102: Cause & Effect
details.actor: Warren Christie/Laura Mennell/Azita Ghanizada/David Strathairn/Ryan Cartwright/Malik Yoba/Erin Way/Mahershala Ali
details.overview: A problematic former patient of Rosen's escapes as Rosen is getting acquainted with his Department of Defense liaison, and the rest of the team tries to balance their normal lives with their work as Alphas.
